sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.prompt: Provide an introduction to the project and guide users through initial setup. Explain what the project does and who it's for.

sections.heading: Installation
sections.prompt: Provide detailed installation instructions including system requirements, dependency installation commands, and verification steps. Include both quick start and detailed installation options.

sections.heading: Configuration
sections.prompt: Explain how to configure the project for first-time use. Include configuration file locations, required settings, optional settings, and examples of common configurations.

sections.heading: Usage
sections.prompt: Provide comprehensive usage examples showing how to use the main features of the project.

sections.heading: Basic Usage
sections.prompt: Show simple, common use cases with minimal code examples. Focus on the most frequently used features and provide copy-paste ready examples.

sections.heading: Advanced Usage
sections.prompt: Demonstrate advanced features and customization options. Include examples of combining features, handling edge cases, and optimizing performance.
